judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed on opinion of Judge Taxis, 21 Pa. D. & C. 2d 753. Each party to pay its own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Irvin Stander, Special Assistant Attorney General, with him Edward J. Ozorowslci, Special Assistant Attorney General, Ralph S. Snyder, Assistant Attorney General, and Anne X. Alpern, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellant.
Guthbert H, Latta, with him Louis D. Stefan, Gormae J. Malloy, and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers & Rhoads, and High, Swartz, Ghilds & Roberts, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Wheelock Trust.
September 26, 1960:
Argued June 1, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Irvin Stander, Special Assistant Attorney General, with him Edward J. Ozorowslci, Special Assistant Attorney General, Ralph S. Snyder, Assistant Attorney General, and Anne X. Alpern, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellant.
Guthbert H, Latta, with him Louis D. Stefan, Gormae J. Malloy, and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers & Rhoads, and High, Swartz, Ghilds & Roberts, for appellees.
